website_summaries.verdict: High-quality, soft leather glove that will serve players with some experience well.
pros: Good build quality in a glove that's designed to last a long time
Includes several different designs for multiple defensive positions as well as both left- and right-handed versions
Glove works great for pre-teens, teen-agers, and adult players
cons: Occasionally may notice problems with the laces popping loose

customer_reviews.title: 9.5” Gamer trainer
customer_reviews.text: We bought the 9.5” for off season training and wow, what an outstanding piece. It is the same pattern as my son’s game glove so training is more natural. The finger stalls are a bit snug on my xl hands but this glove is fantastic. I’m also a big Rawlings fan, so I love the glove. I didn’t expect it on the gamer series but the leather is very stiff and that makes me love it even more. This tiny glove with very stiff leather makes catching with two hands necessary. Now my son is very natural catching with two hands. That alone has made his game a lot stronger.
customer_reviews.author: Ol’ Dirty

customer_reviews.title: Must Own for All Ballplayers
customer_reviews.text: This glove should be the first your child ever owns. Teaches quick hands and helps with learning how to deflect the ball and not squeeze in mitt.
customer_reviews.author: Rhandi

customer_reviews.title: Best glove I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: Super nice glove that I have broken in a a coupe of weeks. Must use the Rawlings break-in oil. Overall, best glove I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.author: Chris Cordray

customer_reviews.title: Great quality glove and price.
customer_reviews.text: Can't go wrong with this glove, seems higher quality than the pictures. Really good leather on this glove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Top quality glove
customer_reviews.text: Very nice glove. Great quality leather. Fits perfect. Will require some break but that’s best. You’ll get to break it in to your liking.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Gray

customer_reviews.title: Good glove but it was for a right handed thrower!
customer_reviews.text: I am left handed. This glove was for a right hander!
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Good mitt.
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great first base mitt for my 11 year old little leaguer. Did not take too long to break in and has been durable through two seasons so far.
customer_reviews.author: TriDad

customer_reviews.title: Great glove
customer_reviews.text: Great training glove to force infielders to get the glove down
customer_reviews.author: Noel Magpoc

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good glove for a very good price my son loved it
customer_reviews.author: jose gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend. Expect a fair amount of break in time
customer_reviews.text: High quality catcher's mitt. Would definitely recommend. Expect a fair amount of break in time.
customer_reviews.author: Chad M Cramer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Broke in nicely and seems of great quality. Fits the hand well and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Wasted Daze

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mitt...put together well and mostly broken in when we received it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Forero

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Exactly what I believed it would be based on picture and description
customer_reviews.author: Hector

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this glove to anyone
customer_reviews.text: Rawlings's products have never fallen below my expectations, it has been my experience, and still is; playing since little league at 5 years old, and still playing in what will be my 70th year; that Rawlings's has always exceeded my expectations. I recommend this glove to anyone, it can only improve your game, after all; Rawlings has the signature of the commissioner printed on it, and stamped with the endorsement as the "Official Baseball" of MLB. Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing glove to use for youth infielders
customer_reviews.text: Awesome glove, bought for my 8 yo and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael

customer_reviews.title: Solid good value glove.
customer_reviews.text: Nice Glove at a reasonable price. Broke in quickly. Still need to see long term with all the lacing but no issues through the 1st season.
customer_reviews.author: Brit Buster

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Glove for my 10 yr old. He LOVES it!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great training glove, helps speed hands up and leather quality is there. Recommended 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Love this glove
customer_reviews.text: Love this glove. Easy break in and snug fit which is how I prefer my glove. Highly recommend this to anyone. Oscar from Fresno.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Sweet glove for the price. Nice leather, lacks a little padding but a good glove overall.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome looking glove, just too small for my hand. Had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: sean drvenkar

customer_reviews.title: Glove Delivers Major League Performance
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a glove! The padding is great, and major league line drives are a breeze. Note: This glove will NOT fit anything larger than a medium adult hand. Not even a large medium adult hand. For the serious ballplayer only.
customer_reviews.author: RobertAtTheBeach

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Happy with our purchase with room for growth from our little leaguer
customer_reviews.author: Hoo-Ra

customer_reviews.title: Great trainer!
customer_reviews.text: Love this training glove. It came in mint condition and arrived quickly. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Morris

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price!
customer_reviews.text: One of the beat gloves I have ever seen for the price. It was ready to use right out of the package. High quality craftsmanship. I highly recommend this glove for anyone who wants a higher end glove for baseball.
customer_reviews.author: andrew2771

customer_reviews.title: Great glove for the price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this glove for my 8 year old son. For the money this is a great glove. This has high dollar glove design with very nice leather, but not the best leather. It took about a week of working the glove and playing catch and it broken in pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Mizzou Tgr

customer_reviews.title: Nice Glove
customer_reviews.text: My 10 yr old son who plays 3rd and Center loves this glove. He has the 11 3/4 size. Fits his hand well. Break-in time was about 2 weeks with a little glove oil and play.
customer_reviews.author: B Young

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, its so soft. My son loves the way it feels.
customer_reviews.author: E.Rivara

customer_reviews.title: My son has been playing first base for three years ...
customer_reviews.text: My son has been playing first base for three years on a travel baseball team. This is his second Rawlings First baseman's mitt. His first one lasted thru 21-22 tournaments and biweekly practice each year. This new mitt has a higher quality leather and i expect it to last him thru high school. This mitt has a much stiffer leather and was a bit harder to break in but he loves it. Henry
customer_reviews.author: Henry Blanton

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great glove, but the laces were dry and cracking when I received it. Tested my lacing skills!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Rawlings Gamer Glove Series
product_meta.description: Featuring an updated pro-style look and feel and improved shell leather for better shape retention, the Rawlings Gamer Series Baseball Training Glove offers unmatched performance for its price point. This 9.5-inch training glove has a single-post web with conventional back, helping infielders practice hand-eye coordination and develop quick hands. A padded thumb sleeve and soft fingerback lining help keep your hand comfortable inside the glove, while the leather-reinforced palm pad delivers added impact protection. Durable Tennessee Tanning rawhide leather laces offer additional durability and strength. The Rawlings Gamer Series Baseball Training Glove comes 80 percent broken-in from the factory, making it practice ready with little-to-no additional conditioning required.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA TENNESSEE tanned lacing
Designed for easy break-in for 8-16 years old
Right Hand Throw = Left Hand Glove, Left Hand Throw = Right Hand Glove
